But the pressure on Mr Andy Coulson became too much last week and in a personal statement he said the controversy meant he could not give the 110% needed to his Number Ten role. Mr Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 after the paper's former royal editor Clive Goodman and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for phone hacking.
